tool_description:
The Push API allows you to push data into your dashboards from your own applications. We provide a simple REST 
API that can be used to push data into your widgets using the JSON data format.
name: Vizdum Flexible Push
title: Vizdum Flexible Push

api_list.name: API Push Bucket
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://liasafinnell-vizdum-flexible-push-v1.p.rapidapi.com//api.test.vizdum.com/bucket/12EE36}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "liasafinnell-vizdum-flexible-push-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://liasafinnell-vizdum-flexible-push-v1.p.rapidapi.com//api.test.vizdum.com/bucket/12EE36}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "liasafinnell-vizdum-flexible-push-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
